summary:

What does this mod do ?
It just removes the bottom lift of Mzinchaleft or Alftand or Raldbthar lift and replaces it with a do
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple fix to that annoying teleport bug.(When you use the lift it teleports you back and forth its really anoying.)
I got stuck in this bug and searched for a mod to fix this but could not find one, so i made a fix/alternative solution for it.
#####################
What does this mod do ?#
#####################
It just removes the bottom lift of Mzinchaleft or Alftand or Raldbthar  and replaces it with a door. You will be able to teleport between areas normally not worrying about the bug.
#Important#
Please do not use followers with this lift!(issue with followers)
##########
I added 3 files depending which lift you are stuck in.
If i left a lift out please let me know.
Version 1.1 is for Blackreach Mzinchaleft  lift i moved the door forward so its equal to the other lifts.
author: Jelly
